price: 39. Ee ah kuwa marka la dulmiyo is difaaca15 (xad gudub la'aan).
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَآ أَصَابَهُمُ ٱلۡبَغۡيُ هُمۡ يَنتَصِرُونَ
footnotes: 15. Nabigu s.c.w. wuxuu yiri: “Saamaxaadda wuxuu Alle ugu ziyaadiyaa qofka sharaf iyo ciso.”

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna idhā aṣābahumu al-baghyu hum yantaṣirūna
